name: New Traditions Elementary School
description: School Type: Elementary School Serves grades: K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper By prioritizing the Arts and recognizing the positive effects of a well rounded education. The parent community is expected to be actively involved and invested in the development of the students’ academic and social skills.
